results.deck: Rayman Legends is the sequel to 2011's Rayman: Origins.
results.name: Rayman Legends

results.deck: Air Conflicts: Pacific Carriers is a flight simulator based in the Pacific Theater of WWII.
results.name: Air Conflicts: Pacific Carriers

results.deck: Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games is an upcoming game based on the fourth movie. It is a minigame-centric title.
results.name: Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games

results.deck: A 3D fighting game set in the .hack universe
results.name: .hack//Versus

results.deck: A sequel to the 2010 kart racer featuring Sega mascots driving vehicles that adapt to land, sea and air.
results.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed

results.deck: Will the 7th volume of Idolmaster's gravure offshoot be the lucky one? Only time will tell!
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 7

results.deck: Turn-based strategy RPG featuring weaponized anime girls. This game is as moe as it gets, y'all!
results.name: Moe Moe Daisensou * Gendaiban++

results.deck: The fourth home-release in the popular Project DIVA series and the first to see international release. The game features new mechanics, as well as the usual changes in songs, modules and collectables.
results.name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA F

results.deck: A new Family Guy game based largely on the episodes 'Road to the Multiverse' and 'The Big Bang Theory' which pits Stewie and Brian against Stewie's (just as) evil half-brother Bertram.
results.name: Family Guy: Back to the Multiverse

results.deck: Isaac Clarke, now aided by a soldier named John Carver, pursues the ominous threat of the Markers to the ice world Tau Volantis, now overrun with the terrifying Necromorphs, as well as the Human cultists who worship them.
results.name: Dead Space 3

results.deck: Traveller's Tales brings the LEGO treatment to The Lord of the Rings, following the events of all three movies.
results.name: LEGO The Lord of the Rings

results.deck: Race superbikes in Milestone's latest, SBK Generations.
results.name: SBK Generations

results.deck: A 3DS/PS3 spin off of Capcom's "Lost Planet" franchise, designed in a Graphic Novel/Manga style setting involving teenagers.
results.name: E.X. Troopers

results.deck: A turn-based world conquest game where the player faces off against history's famous leaders and thinkers re-imagined as anime girls.
results.name: Eiyuu Senki: The World Conquest

results.deck: 2012 edition of 2K's NBA franchise.
results.name: NBA 2K13

results.deck: WWE '13, using the tagline "Live the Revolution," is the fifteenth annual WWE game from THQ and Yuke's.
results.name: WWE '13

results.deck: The second NASCAR game from Eutechnyx.  Features the series' top drivers and all 23 tracks.
results.name: NASCAR The Game: Inside Line

results.deck: Play as the vampire lord Dracula and wreak vengeance against your enemies in this continuation to the Lords of Shadow reboot of the Castlevania franchise.
results.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2

results.deck: Can your PlayStation 3 handle this much Gravure? There's only one way to find out.
results.name: The Id@lmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 8

results.deck: With a heavy focus on Arena combat, Ratchet and Clank: Full Frontal Assault pits the familiar faces from the long running series into a series of MOBA-like battles.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault

results.deck: Guardians of Middle-earth is an action real-time strategy video game based around The Lord of the Rings franchise.
results.name: Guardians of Middle-earth

results.deck: A compilation of Sengoku Basara, Sengoku Basara 2 and Sengoku Basara 2: Heroes, remastered for the PlayStation 3 with high-definition graphics.
results.name: Sengoku Basara HD Collection

results.deck: The DC Universe's most powerful heroes and villains collide in this 2.5D fighting game from the creators of the Mortal Kombat series.
results.name: Injustice: Gods Among Us

results.deck: Players would have taken the role of a bounty hunter in this gritty third-person shooter set in the Star Wars universe. After the shuttering of LucasArts, the game has been presumed canceled.
results.name: Star Wars 1313

results.deck: Also known as PES 2013, this is the new game of the very popular Konami soccer franchise.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2013

results.deck: Players cruise the streets of the city Fairhaven, evading the cops while working their way to the top of the most wanted street racers list in this open-street racing game from Criterion Games.
results.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted

results.deck: Sports Champions 2 expands it's appeal by adding a new set of events, in addition to a much-improved Archery mode.
results.name: Sports Champions 2

results.deck: A remake of the first Painkiller and its expansion, Battle out of Hell, using Unreal Engine 3.
results.name: Painkiller Hell & Damnation

results.deck: A third-person open-world game from Ubisoft, set in a dark alternate version of the US where corporations track and catalog all online behavior over a vast data network. A vigilante group called the Watch_Dogs hacks into this data, using it to hunt criminals.
results.name: Watch Dogs

results.deck: The fourth game by Quantic Dream. It tells the story of Jodie Holmes, a girl with mysterious powers who is on the run from the law.
results.name: Beyond: Two Souls

results.deck: Just Dance 4 is the next instalment of Ubisoft's popular franchise. You guessed it, it still doesn't contain the hit song the series is named after.
results.name: Just Dance 4

results.deck: DanceStar: Party Hits is a PlayStation Move dance game from SCE London.
results.name: DanceStar: Party Hits

results.deck: Book of Spells is a move title that uses a physical storybook, the playstation eye, and the move wand to take players through the extended fiction of J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter series.
results.name: Wonderbook: Book of Spells

results.deck: Crash-land into another zombie-infested tropical island in this direct sequel to the 2011 survival horror action RPG, Dead Island.
results.name: Dead Island Riptide

results.deck: The final installment of Dynasty Warriors 7.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 7: Empires

results.deck: The hyper-gory post-apocalyptic action returns in this sequel to the large-scale brawler based on the Fist of the North Star franchise (celebrating the 30th anniversary of the series). You are already dead.
results.name: Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage 2

results.deck: Diggs Nightcrawler is a Wonderbook title from Moonbot Studios.
results.name: Diggs Nightcrawler

results.deck: With the help from the CRIMENET underground criminal network, the Payday crew don their masks once again for a new epic crime spree in Washington, D.C.
results.name: Payday 2

results.deck: A survival horror game from the creators of Two Worlds.
results.name: Sacrilegium

results.deck: A visual novel set in 2030 created by the director of the Infinity series.
results.name: Root Double: Before Crime * After Days

results.deck: A military themed turn based strategy game.
results.name: Daisenryaku Perfect: Senjou no Hasha

results.deck: The 2012 entry in Konami's longrunning Power Pro baseball series.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2012

results.deck: Ben 10: Omniverse coincides with the popular cartoon series.
results.name: Ben 10: Omniverse

results.deck: miCoach by adidas features over 400 workouts with top-tier athletes including Dwight Howard, Kaka, and Jessica Ennis.
results.name: miCoach by adidas

results.deck: Worms Revolution is the next game in the Worms franchise from Team 17 Software. Built entirely from scratch, Revolution will return to the series' 2D roots.
results.name: Worms Revolution

results.deck: Fourteenth flagship title in the Tales series and direct sequel to Tales of Xillia.
results.name: Tales of Xillia 2

results.deck: Despite the misleading title, this is actually an on-disc collection of the previously PSN-exclusive titles flOw, Flower, and Journey.
results.name: Journey Collector's Edition

results.deck: The third numbered game in the Ultimate Ninja Storm series promises an in-depth story mode and upgraded battle system.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3

results.deck: Race the 2012 Tour de France on your console.
results.name: Le Tour de France 2012

results.deck: Telltale's continuation of the Back to the Future story.  It contains 5 episodes.
results.name: Back to the Future: The Game

results.deck: This collection contains the HD versions of DBZ Budokai & Budokai 3.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD Collection

results.deck: Relive the adventures of Vietnam veteran John Rambo in this rail shooter based on the first three Rambo films.
results.name: Rambo: The Video Game

results.deck: A fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 and published by Namco Bandai, the cast of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure square off to see who is the last man standing in the ongoing clash of the Joestar bloodline against Dio Brando, his descendants and other bizarre enemies.
results.name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle

results.deck: A first-person survival horror game and prequel to the horror drama television series The Walking Dead, telling the tale of hunter Daryl Dixon as he travels through the rural U.S.A. with his brother, Merle, during the beginning of the zombie outbreak.
results.name: The Walking Dead: Survival Instinct

results.deck: Farming Simulator 2013 is the first in the franchise to be released for home consoles; it features an additional 20 licensed tractors and new animals.
results.name: Farming Simulator 2013

results.deck: Angry Birds, and two of its spin-offs, for your home console
results.name: Angry Birds Trilogy

results.deck: A family friendly kart racing game from Codemasters based on Formula One.
results.name: F1 Race Stars

results.deck: Eureka Seven: AO - The Flowers of Jungfrau, which features mecha-piloting PlayStation 3 game
results.name: Eureka Seven: AO - The Flowers of Jungfrau

results.deck: Break the fourth wall in this 3rd person action game, the first headlined by "The Merc With A Mouth" Deadpool.
results.name: Deadpool

results.deck: DICE's popular multiplayer-focused shooter series continues, making its debut appearance on the PS4 and Xbox One.
results.name: Battlefield 4

results.deck: After separating from her friend Lee, young orphan Clementine must survive through the undead apocalypse with a new roaming group of survivors in this sequel to Telltale's original five-part adventure based on the comic book The Walking Dead.
results.name: The Walking Dead: Season Two

results.deck: O Games is responsible for this multiplatform karaoke release.
results.name: Everyone Sing

results.deck: The fourth main entry in the Samurai Warriors series. It was released in 2014 to coincide with the tenth anniversary of the franchise.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 4

results.deck: This hybrid release packs a Blu-Ray copy of the 1984 film "The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?" with a new PS3 game called "My Boyfriend is a Pilot 2012."
results.name: The Super Dimension Fortress Macross Hybrid Pack

results.deck: The final game in Lightning's story arc in the Final Fantasy XIII universe.
results.name: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII

results.deck: The third game in the Army of Two franchise, abandoning its original protagonists in favor of two new heroes, known only by the codenames Alpha and Bravo.
results.name: Army of Two: The Devil's Cartel

results.deck: The sixth entry in PlayStation's flagship racing series, Gran Turismo 6 hopes to bring a better, richer driving experience, including 1200 cars and new features like improved car personalization.
results.name: Gran Turismo 6

results.deck: A true sequel and new installment in the BlazBlue franchise, taking place after the events of Continuum Shift.
results.name: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma

results.deck: The fifth entry in Synetic's longrunning Alarm für Cobra 11 series.
results.name: Crash Time 5: Undercover

results.deck: God of War Saga is a compliation of previous God of War titles, remastered in HD and in one box.
results.name: God of War Saga

results.deck: The year is 2013 and these hunts just got a little more... dangerous.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2013

results.deck: A video game adaptation of Reki Kawahara's Light Novel series.
results.name: Accel World: Ginyoku no Kakusei

results.deck: The follow-up to IHF Handball Challenge 12. It was quietly canceled so that work in IHF Handball Challenge 14 could begin.
results.name: IHF Handball Challenge 13

results.deck: Rain is developed by SCE Japan Studio. It is called in Asia as 'Lost in the Rain'.
results.name: Rain

results.deck: After his soul is trapped in a puppet's body, young Kutaro must fight against the shadowy forces of the Bear King who rules over the Moon in order to get his real body back.
results.name: Puppeteer

results.deck: The third entry in the AKB1/48 dating series. Originally titled AKB1/153, it was officially renamed to AKB1/149 to reflect the recent departure of four members that were planned to be in the game. Coming out on PSP and Vita this game will include members from AKB48, SKE48, NMB48, and HKT48.
results.name: AKB1/149 Renai Sousenkyo

results.deck: The third installment of ASCARON's Sacred franchise, now owned by Deep Silver. It was first shown to the public at PAX Prime 2012.
results.name: Sacred 3

results.deck: The stand-alone prelude to Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain, giving players a taste of the new open-world gameplay mechanics while setting up the main game's story, as Snake (Big Boss) must infiltrate a prison camp to rescue his comrades.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes

results.deck: The Killzone collection includes a remastered HD version of Killzone with a full set of trophies, Killzone 2 and Killzone 3 with all multiplayer map packs included for both games.
results.name: Killzone Trilogy

results.deck: A game based on the movie Iron Sky.
results.name: Iron Sky Invasion

results.deck: Officially licensed rugby from Tru Blu Games for the 2012 season.
results.name: Rugby League Live 2

results.deck: WRC 3, not to be confused with WRC 3 released in 2003, is an officially licensed FIA World Rally Championship game from Milestone.
results.name: WRC 3

results.deck: One of the many ninja henchmen slain by Ryu Hayabusa is back for blood in this Ninja Gaiden spinoff. The project is directed by Keiji Inafune of Dead Rising fame, and jointly developed by Inafune's company Comcept, Team Ninja and Spark Unlimited.
results.name: Yaiba: Ninja Gaiden Z

results.deck: Ninja Gaiden 3: Razor's Edge is an upgraded version of Ninja Gaiden 3, featuring additions such as gameplay tweaks, dismemberment, multiple weapons, new playable characters, and online co-op.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden 3: Razor's Edge

results.deck: While investigating a mass murder, Detective Sebastian Castellanos descends into a gruesome, nightmarish world. This third-person survival horror game marks the debut of Tango Gameworks, a studio headed by Resident Evil progenitor Shinji Mikami.
results.name: The Evil Within

results.deck: A high definition remastering of the first two Yakuza/Ryu ga Gotoku games.
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku 1&2 HD EDITION

results.deck: Build the most suitable gun for hunting all kinds of game from North America to Africa.
results.name: Cabela's Hunting Expeditions

results.deck: Over 30 Midway arcade releases appear on one disc in this new Warner Bros. compilation.
results.name: Midway Arcade Origins

results.deck: A PlayStation 3 HD compilation of Kingdom Hearts Final Mix and Kingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories. Though not playable, remastered HD cutscenes and new scenes from Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days are viewable.
results.name: Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX

results.deck: New entry in the historical strategy simulation series.
results.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XII

results.deck: The Project Diva Extend is extended onto PlayStation 3 in yet another Hatsune Miku release.
results.name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Dreamy Theater Extend

results.deck: This package gives you all the Worms crawling on XBLA and PSN on one disc.
results.name: Worms Collection

results.deck: Namco Bandai next Gundam game for PS Vita and PlayStation 3 with cross-platform play.
results.name: Gundam Breaker

results.deck: A rodeo game for Kinect from D3 Publisher.
results.name: Top Hand Rodeo Tour

results.deck: Ay yo, attack that legend!
results.name: Eureka Seven: AO Attack the Legend

results.deck: An educational Wonderbook game based on the BBC show of the same name. Players use the PS Move to interact with and learn about dinosaurs.
results.name: Walking With Dinosaurs

results.deck: The popular science fiction film franchise crosses over into Angry Birds territory.
results.name: Angry Birds: Star Wars

results.deck: Accel World anime Series gets a PlayStation 3 and PSP follow-up.
results.name: Accel World: Kasoku no Choten

results.deck: The last two entries in the Darkstalkers trilogy return in this enhanced downloadable compilation for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Darkstalkers Resurrection

results.deck: The long-running game show returns to consoles in 2012 for PS3, Xbox 360, and Wii U.
results.name: Jeopardy!: America's Favorite Quiz Show
